name: Amie
description: A joyful productivity app combining calendar, task management, and email, designed to help users stay organized with natural language scheduling and extensive integrations.
longDescription:
Amie is a productivity app launched in January 2024 by Amie GmbH, integrating calendar, todos, and email into a single platform. It aims to rethink time management with a focus on joyful design and efficiency, offering features like natural language scheduling and AI-powered tools.

Developed in Berlin, Germany, Amie is available on Mac, iOS, Web, and Windows, supporting a seamless experience across devices. It includes extensive integrations with apps like Todoist, Zoom, and Spotify, and is praised for its clean interface and user-friendly approach.

Created in 2020, Amie GmbH raised $7 million in 2022 to bring this vision to life, targeting busy professionals and students. With a free Basic plan and a $5/month Pro tier, Amie balances accessibility and advanced functionality, competing with traditional calendar and task management tools.
